name: finnish-dictionary
title: Finnish Dictionary
description: MacOS has a great dictionary, but it's not available for Finnish. This extension adds a Finnish dictionary at your fingertips.
author: albertoxamin

commands.name: fe
commands.title: Finnish to English
commands.subtitle: Define a finnish word to english
commands.description: Define a finnish word to english

commands.name: ef
commands.title: English to Finnish
commands.subtitle: Define an english word to finnish
commands.description: Define a finnish word to english

commands.name: general-lookup
commands.title: Language to Language
commands.subtitle: Define a word to from any language
commands.description: Define a word from any language to any language
